text: 18.25: 2 Kin 4.1 naŋga, Neh 5.8Hara tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋami hañɨndu kɨmbɨ ŋguhu ŋandi maŋgɨyɨmi. Kamataharɨm aru miku hama ambami, Kru kanɨmaŋ, nɨmburiŋ, naŋga ñɨŋisɨmɨŋ naŋga nuŋandɨ muhɨmɨmuhɨm sɨhanaŋga ŋgutɨra kru muŋɨnɨŋ mut mɨŋamu. Kamatu sɨmbɨrasara saŋɨŋɨnɨŋ yɨvurahɨtu, tɨmbahɨrɨs ha mɨŋata yaŋ ŋgumara, vamba ambami.
